title: Spirit Howl
data:
{{obsolete}}
'''Spirit Howl''' is a monster-only spell which afflicts you with the Howl [[status effect]]. As long as you suffer from this, [[spirit wolves]] will rapidly generate and will seek you out by the shortest path possible. Eventually the status effect will end, dismissing all spirit wolves not currently in your [[line of sight]], and there is a fixed cap on how many spirit wolves you can face in a given game.

The following enemies cast Spirit Howl:
*[[Spirit wolf]]

==History==
This spell was added in [[0.13]], but only existed in wizard mode. Removed in [[0.14]].
